acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Webster Family Library, Cummings School of Veterinary Medicine, 2021, accession MS-2022-015.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged in one series.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: John A. Seaverns bequeathed his collection of equine and canine books and related materials to the Tufts University School of Veterinary Medicine in 1994. In 2021, the John A. Seaverns Equine Collection, consisting of ephemera, rare book and auction catalogs, and horse show programs, was transferred by John Bourgeois, Library Manager at the Webster Family Library, from the Webster Family Library to Digital Collections and Archives. Some of the books that were part of the original gift to the School of Veterinary Medicine were also transferred to Tisch Library in 2021.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John A. Seaverns Equine Collection, 1864 -- 2001. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Records and Accessioning Archivist, Jane Kelly, in March 2022. Original order was maintained and loose material was placed in archival folders. A box-level inventory and series-level descriptions were created, and the finding aid was created at the time of processing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains ephemera, publications, and rare book and auction catalogs related to horses and horseback riding, primarily in the United States, dating from the late 19th century through 2001. Ephemera includes fabric swatches, prints, supply catalogs, sheet music, scrapbooks, stamps, clippings, a record, and a flipbook. The collection also contains a small number of rare book catalogs related to dogs.

scopecontent.head: Content Warning
scopecontent.p: This collection contains ephemera with racist caricatures. For more information on DCA's content warning policy please visit our website.
